```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library("jpeg")
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
```

## What Data, and Where is it from?

Sourced from [Maven Analytics](https://mavenanalytics.io/data-playground?page=5&pageSize=5)

```{r include=FALSE}
spacemission <- read_csv("spacemission/space_missions.csv") %>% clean_names()
```

```{r}
glimpse(spacemission)
```

```{r eval=FALSE, include=FALSE}
spacemission %>%
  separate(location, into = c("site", "county","state", "country"), sep = ",") %>%
  unite(area, "country", "state", sep = ",")
```
